comment.author: 19630765@N04
comment._content: The building in the background is the Singer Building, the third tallest building ever destroyed (behind the two World Trade Center towers, of course). It was also the tallest building in the world From 1908-1909.

comment.author: 9730593@N04
comment._content: the caption is wonderfully informative, if your eyes are up to the challenge.

comment.author: 93844237@N00
comment._content: I know its truly NYC in  the early 20th century , but it reminds me of the illustrations of that time of what  it was thought that the city would look like in the 21st century ala Jules Verne.
